restaurant.name: Prospect Butcher Co
restaurant.description: Brooklyn's premier whole-animal butcher shop. Craft sandwiches made with house-cured meats.

sandwiches.name: Smoked Brisket
sandwiches.description: House-smoked beef brisket, pickled onions, horseradish cream, on ciabatta

sandwiches.name: Pulled Pork
sandwiches.description: Slow-roasted pulled pork, house slaw, Carolina mustard BBQ, on brioche

sandwiches.name: House Pastrami
sandwiches.description: Hand-cured pastrami, spicy mustard, Swiss, sauerkraut, on rye

sandwiches.name: Italian Hero
sandwiches.description: Capicola, sopressata, mortadella, provolone, hot peppers, olive oil, on a seeded roll

sandwiches.name: Porchetta
sandwiches.description: Crispy porchetta, broccoli rabe, sharp provolone, on ciabatta

sandwiches.name: Roasted Turkey Club
sandwiches.description: House-roasted turkey, bacon, avocado, lettuce, tomato, mayo, on sourdough

sandwiches.name: Meatball Parm
sandwiches.description: Beef and pork meatballs, marinara, fresh mozzarella, basil, on a hero roll

sandwiches.name: Cuban
sandwiches.description: Roasted pork, ham, Swiss, pickles, mustard, pressed on Cuban bread

tax.note: All prices shown are pre-tax. Tax will be calculated at checkout.
